title: Abigail and Her Pet Zombie
description: Abigail isn't a normal five-year-old girl. She doesn't have normal five-year-old pets. Abigail has a pet Zombie. This is their story... This is the first book of the Abigail and her pet Zombie Series from author Marie F Crow. It is a humorous story of a little girl and her comical pet. This is an illustrated, lighthearted, fun short story for ages 6 to 8.
author: Marie F. Crow
